title: Ichaicha Shiyou Yo, Kumakei Kareshi-Kun.
alternative_title: Flirting With My Bear-Like Boyfriend ; イチャイチャしようよ、クマ系彼氏くん。
status: Flirting With My Bear-Like Boyfriend ; イチャイチャしようよ、クマ系彼氏くん。
description:
Description :
        "You feel amazing inside, Rina." Kyou's masculine body envelops me like a bear… With his you-know-what being big, too, it plunges deep inside me over and over again.
